C

calculateDeviationFromOptimalEncoding(Huffman) - Method in class Huffman
Finds deviation from the optimal encoding by calculating percent change between the total comparison entropy and the total entropy of the object calling this method.
calculateRatio(int) - Method in class Huffman
This method calculates ratio of space needed for encoding a given amount of letters using fixed-length encoding to the space expected to be taken by Huffman code encoding.
calculateSumOfFrequencies(boolean) - Method in class Huffman
Finds total sum of alphabet's symbol frequencies.
calculateTotalAlphabetEntropy(boolean) - Method in class Huffman
Finds total alphabet entropy by summing up the entropy of each individual symbol throughout the alphabet.
Code - Class in <Unnamed>
Stores Huffman code key and frequency.
Code(String, long, int, Code) - Constructor for class Code
Code constructor which stores all needed information about a given key in a data encoding algorithm.
code - Variable in class Code
 
Compression - Class in <Unnamed>
Compression class handles essential tasks for any data encoding algorithm.
Compression() - Constructor for class Compression
